name: Four-Armed Gargoyle
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: False Appearance
text: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The gargoyle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

description: Source: Tales from the Yawning Portal p. 129
